column4: hi all, i need help please. i ran kubuntu and geting troble in the booting, when i choose at "grub" for any kernal it starts loading my system (kubuntu) and than after 20 sec it's just freeze without doing nothing... just stuck on the screen with th name kubuntu and the blue scroll beneath it freeze too... any1?
it's a command you can type into a terminal, to output the kernel in use, among other system information
